metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8704 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description:
An integer overflow in the process_bin_append_prepend function in Memcached, which is responsible for processing multiple commands of Memcached binary protocol, can be abused to cause heap overflow and lead to remote code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.4.14-0ubuntu9.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.14-0ubuntu9.1').
